title.value: Закономерности распределения ячеек спонгиозы тел грудных позвонков лошади и крупного рогатого скота
Regularities of distribution of spongiose cell bodies breast vertebras of horses and cattle
Regularities of distribution of spongiose cell bodies breast vertebras of horses and cattle

journal.title: Agriculture - Problems and Prospects : collection of scientific papers

person.name: Vasilyeva, L.V., Vitebsk State Academy of Veterinary Medicine (Belarus)

abstract.value: In the conditions of the Republic of Belarus there were presented the results of calculations of average distance between cells of spongy substance of bodies of chest vertebras of a horse and cattle. As a result of the lead researches there was, that the least distance between cells, on the average for all vertebra body, at both animals, it is marked in dorsa-ventral direction. The greatest - is marked in crania-caudal. The original technique of their receiving is stated. Such parameter, as distance between pores has been taken in work for a basis at the spongiose description. However, at small updating of a technique it is possible to pass easily and to other parameters. The choice of this or that spongiose characteristic should depend on the research purposes and problems. The main regularities of placement of cells in various sites of a bone are presented. The short comparative and anatomic analysis, taking into account specifics of load of the chest vertebras, the considered species is carried out.
